sentences.en: " Ah, " thought Carrie, with mournful misgivings, " what is it I have lost? "
sentences.cn: “ 唉, ” 嘉莉感到悲哀和担忧, “ 我失去的是 什么 ? ”

sentences.en: A mournful smile flitted across her face and her eyes dimmed with tears.
sentences.cn: 她想着,脸上时时浮出凄凉的微笑,但是眼睛里还有泪珠.

sentences.en: A mournful wind blew through the trees.
Durant was thin, mournful and silent.
sentences.cn: 杜兰特很消瘦，神情悲伤，沉默不语。

sentences.en: He found himself sitting opposite Mei. They spoke very little. Occasionally they exchanged a mournful glance.
sentences.cn: 他恰恰坐在梅的对面, 他们很少说话, 只是偶尔交换一瞥忧郁的眼光.

sentences.en: He looked mournful, even near to tears.
sentences.cn: 他看起来很悲伤，几乎要流泪了。

sentences.en: He rushed out; he thought he heard a mournful wail.
sentences.cn: 他走出门去, 耳边顿时起了一阵悲惨的叫声.

sentences.en: His heart skipping unevenly, his face mournful , Mr. Lin was unable to speak for some time.
sentences.cn: 林先生的眼光跟着寿生的嘴也向那边瞥了一下, 心里直是乱跳,哭丧着脸, 好半天说不出话来.

sentences.en: I couldn't bear the mournful look on her face.
sentences.cn: 我受不了她脸上那忧伤的神情。

sentences.en: It looked on downcast faces, the images of mournful hearts.
sentences.cn: 人们脸上也是阴沉沉的,愁眉不展, 反映着凄楚的心情.

sentences.en: Miss Dickerman was tall and somewhat mournful-looking.
sentences.cn: 迪克曼小姐个子高高的，看上去有些苦相。

sentences.en: Mournful fancies came flocking on her mind , in crowds.
sentences.cn: 悲伤的幻想便纷纷涌上她的心头.

sentences.en: On the street, the watchman's gong resounded deep and mournful - once, twice. It was ten o'clock.
sentences.cn: 在街中响着锣声,沉重而悲怆, 二更锣敲了.
她叹了口气,显得很伤心.

sentences.en: Silent, mournful, abandoned , broken , Czechoslovakia recedes into the darkness.
sentences.cn: 缄默的 、 悲哀的 、 被抛弃的 、 支离破碎的捷克斯洛伐克,已在黑暗之中.

sentences.en: The dog immediately began to grind most mournful music.
sentences.cn: 那条狗立即开始摩擦出最悲伤的音乐来.

sentences.en: the slow, mournful music of the bagpipes
sentences.cn: 风笛奏出的缓慢、忧伤的音乐

words.tran_cn: 哀悼者；悲伤者；送葬者；忏悔者

trans.tran_cn: 哀痛的，令人伤心的，悲伤的，使人伤心（沮丧）的，凄凄切切
trans.tran_en: If you are mournful, you are very sad
